        Throws:

      • editRecord

        void editRecord(java.lang.String userId,
              StudentRecord record,
              java.lang.Boolean permanent)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves a new set of student data to the records data.
        Parameters:
        userId - the student ID to overwrite.
        transcript - the new student record
        permanent - a status flag indicating whether (if false) to make a temporary edit to the in-memory structure or (if true) a permanent edit.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the transcript data could not be saved or failed a validity check. SEE NOTE IN CLASS HEADER.

               int endYear)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates a list of transactions for a chosen period.
        Parameters:
        userId - the student to generate the list for.
        startMonth - the month of the start date.
        startDay - the day of the start date.
        startYear - the year of the start date.
        endMonth - the month of the end date.
        endDay - the day of the end date.
        endYear - the year of the end date.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the bill could not be generated. SEE NOTE IN CLASS HEADER.

      • applyPayment

        void applyPayment(java.lang.String userId,
                double amount,
                java.lang.String note)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Makes a payment for the student
        Parameters:
        userId - the student to make a payment for.
        amount - amount to apply to the balance.
        note - a string indicating the reason for the payment
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the payment fails a validity check or fails to save to file. SEE NOTE IN CLASS HEADER.
